goal: Define the main KnowledgeGraph container class with node/edge storage and retrieval methods

contains.name: KnowledgeGraph
contains.description: Main container class for the knowledge graph with node/edge storage and retrieval

contains.name: add_node
contains.description: Add a node to the graph

contains.name: add_edge
contains.description: Add an edge to the graph

contains.name: get_node
contains.description: Retrieve a node by its ID, returns None if not found

contains.name: get_edges
contains.description: Get edges for a node, optionally filtered by edge type

contains.name: nodes
contains.description: Property returning all nodes in the graph

contains.name: edges
contains.description: Property returning all edges in the graph

contains.name: node_count
contains.description: Property returning the count of nodes in the graph

contains.name: edge_count
contains.description: Property returning the count of edges in the graph
